=== PROUD TO BE CANADIAN ===

--- Ultimate Guitar Version ---
Source: Ultimate Guitar (Unregistered)

Tuning: Standard (E-A-D-G-B-E)

Date: Thu, 14 Sep 1995
From: Rambozo <jjm@nucleus.com>

well this is basically two riffs... i'm not gonna tab out the solo
parts.. so please don't e-mail me and ask for them... thanx..
